Starthack Hackathon

by Lucas Gatsas on Mar 13, 2016
Scroll Down

The Start @ Hackathon
St. Gallen

The Event START hack was Awesome! Alot of Peoples were there at the Event. Had a HD crash, so I had no LapTop. This was Crazy for me to get in Action. I was in the team Cesar. We eventually publish our project on GitHub. We had written a Mortage Calculator.

“Namics Challenge Winner” Project at Start Hack Hackathon in Switzerland —

Github - Clear

Team Cesare:

Cesare cesare.io

And the Winner was Alica Sykes with here Sentiment Sweep Project.

How do you think the world is feeling via Twitter? Sentiment Sweep can let you know! Built at @START_Hack pic.twitter.com/4pVUuNDtpC

— Major League Hacking (@MLHacks) 13. März 2016

Can’t wait for the Next Hackathon here at the STARThack in St. Gallen, Switzerland, next time with more Gadget and my own Tools.

Starthack 2016 Starthack 2016 - Facebook Twitter

"35 hours of coding START Hack is a 35-hour coding and prototyping marathon focused on FinTech, Internet of Things, and Mobility. "

“If you are going to walk on thin ice, you might as well dance”
